page.title: 13Transport
page.content: This, being a rural area is not at all well served by public transport. A public service bus goes through the area in the morning picking up commuters for business in Kirkcudbright, and also the school children going to the Academy. This bus returns at 4pm carrying the children home. During the holidays, no bus runs. The Post Office runs three mini-buses each day,leaving the Post Office in Borgue at 9.00am after bringing in the children to school. It leaves again at 10.30am, and another bus leaves at 3.30pm to carry the children home. This is a very important service for the people who do not have cars.
